title: 'That room can go to evacuees': How the Rams moved their playoff game to Arizona amid L.A. wildfires
description: For the Rams, the game's location, SoFi Stadium or not, quickly became secondary to what is happening in their home city.
author: Sarah Barshop

title: Why Vikings' Kevin O'Connell is the quintessential modern NFL coach
description: Empath O'Connell dismisses the idea he's soft or too sensitive as he sheds the old-school style of coaching.
author: Kevin Seifert

title: Fury announces retirement from boxing again
description: Former heavyweight world champion Tyson Fury announces his retirement from boxing.

title: Maybe I should have made summer signings - Guardiola
description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola says he may have made a mistake by telling the club to scrap plans to buy players last summer.

title: Vikings vs. Rams live updates: Wild-card round wraps in Arizona
description: Minnesota and Los Angeles, playing tonight in Arizona due to wildfires, will try to shake off Week 18 losses ahead of the playoffs. Follow the action here!
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Russell Wilson wants to play for Pittsburgh again in 2025: Do the Steelers want him back?
description: Pittsburgh's upside is capped with Wilson, but finding a quarterback to compete with the likes of Patrick Mahomes, Lamar Jackson and Josh Allen is not a realistic goal. What are the Steelers to do?
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Fury announces retirement from boxing
description: Tyson Fury has announced his retirement from boxing with immediate effect.

title: Hearn: Fury quitting due to 'AJ pressure'? | Warren: He has nothing to prove!
description: Tyson Fury could have entered retirement because he is feeling the "pressure" surrounding a blockbuster fight against Anthony Joshua, says promoter Eddie Hearn.
